item.title: By: Memoria
item.dc:creator: Memoria
item.description: That's hilarious about the ice cream "recipe"!! Nevertheless, the ice cream looks fantastic. I love your blog and your process photos!! Thanks for stopping by my blog and leaving such nice comments.
item.content:encoded: That’s hilarious about the ice cream “recipe”!! Nevertheless, the ice cream looks fantastic. I love your blog and your process photos!! Thanks for stopping by my blog and leaving such nice comments.

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: lol, I remember seeing jamie making that dessert on one of his shows years ago. I laughed then and now I laugh even more! Almost every australian had made that dessert and now its been credited to jamie oliver...too funny!
item.content:encoded: lol, I remember seeing jamie making that dessert on one of his shows years ago. I laughed then and now I laugh even more! Almost every australian had made that dessert and now its been credited to jamie oliver…too funny!

item.title: By: cherryblossomcupcakes
item.dc:creator: cherryblossomcupcakes
item.description: He he he.. love the cheeky dessert. Can't beat maltesers! This menu looks fab.
item.content:encoded: He he he.. love the cheeky dessert. Can’t beat maltesers! This menu looks fab.

item.title: By: Cakelaw
item.dc:creator: Cakelaw
item.description: The pasta bake looks fab - yum!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I love the surprisingly simple dessert! The tomatoes look awesome too. It's great when something looks beautiful and tastes good at the same time.
item.content:encoded: I love the surprisingly simple dessert! The tomatoes look awesome too. It’s great when something looks beautiful and tastes good at the same time.

item.title: By: Lisa
item.dc:creator: Lisa
item.description: I'm in visual tastebud love. Those stuffed tomatoes look absolutely incredible, and the pasta so creamilicious! Not to mention, your photos are moutrh watering! Bookmarked to add more fat to my butt lol
item.content:encoded: I’m in visual tastebud love. Those stuffed tomatoes look absolutely incredible, and the pasta so creamilicious! Not to mention, your photos are moutrh watering! Bookmarked to add more fat to my butt lol
